summary: Two men, Charlie Hinton (Eddie Murphy) and Phil Ryerson (Jeff Garlin), get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

keywords: breakfast cereal|quitting a job|sabotage|laid off|face painting
title: Papá Canguro
